title: Katie Price 'thrown out of club' after boozy night out with ex Dane Bowers
text:

Katie Price was reportedly thrown out of a London club this week after a boozy night out with her ex Dane Bowers.

The former glamour girl, 41, was pictured knocking back drinks at Jakata in the capital, where former Another Level star Dane was performing.

The snaps show Katie looking worse for wear as the night wore on, even slumping against a wall at one point.

She was also seen chatting to a number of different men, including Boyzone star Shane Lynch.

The Sun Online reports he night ended badly for Katie as she was eventually removed from the club by security guards.

A source said: "Katie turned up to support Dane's new band Boyz On Block, but she was a total nightmare.

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

"She [was] rampaging around the place and demanding shots of Limoncello.

"Katie even... snuck behind the bar to take drinks when the staff weren't looking...

"By the end, enough was enough and she had to go."

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

The night out marked the end of a rough week for Katie after she was slapped with her fourth driving ban.

She's been banished from the roads for two years after failing to tell police who was driving her Range Rover when it crashed last October.

Katie pleaded guilty to the charge at a hearing in August, and got her sentenced haded to her on Thursday.

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

She's had a rough year after her latest round of cosmetic surgery left her with weeping wounds and an infection.

Over the summer, her relationship with fiance Kris Boyson crumbled after she was caught cheating on him with new toyboy Charles Drury.

Katie dumped him by text after she was pictured in Turkey with her new man, but they now appear to be on the verge of a reconciliation.

Mirror Online has contacted a representative for Katie for comment.
